name: Robert the Druid has Made a Terrible Mistake
name_original: Robert the Druid has Made a Terrible Mistake
description:
Robert made a terrible mistake! He accidently opened a gate to the Dark World. However, with his last Magical Seed he will build an Army of  Trees to defeat the  incoming hordes of enemies.

Controls:

Just the mouse.  Left click to  conjure trees, harvest them, and switch between tree types

Tips!

The beginning of the game is meant to be hard, but it is not impossible.
